onset.Description: Event onset in seconds relative to first volume of imaging dataset; i.e. without accounting for later deletion of dummy volumes

Levels.targetScreen: Screen showing targets; not a stimulus event

task_relevance.Description: Task Relevance of the presented stimulus

Levels.targetScreen: Screen showing targets; not a stimulus event
Screen showing targets; not a stimulus event

Levels.[0-9]{4}: 4 digit stimulus coding the stimulus category, orientation and specific stimulus. Where: 1st digit = stimulus type (1 = face; 2 = object; 3 = letter; 4 = false font). 2nd digit = stimulus orientation (1 = center; 2 = left; 3 = right). 3rd & 4th digits = stimulus id (1...20; for faces 1...10 is male, 11...20 is female). E.g. 1219 = 1 is face, 2 is left orientation and 19 is a female stimulus
Levels.targetScreen: Screen showing targets; not a stimulus event
